Jx.Field.Color

Extends: Jx.Field

This class provides a Jx.Field.Text in combination with a Jx.Button.Color to have a Colorpicker with an input field.

License

Copyright © 2010, Paul Spener, Fred Warnock, Conrad Barthelmes

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Field.ColorExtends: Jx.Field
Options
templateThe template used to render this field
showOnHover{Boolean} show the color palette when hovering over the input, default is false
showDelayset time in milliseconds when to show the color field on mouseenter
errorMsgerror message for the validator.
colora color to initialize the field with, defaults to #000000 (black) if not specified.

Options

template

The template used to render this field

showOnHover

{Boolean} show the color palette when hovering over the input, default is false

showDelay

set time in milliseconds when to show the color field on mouseenter

errorMsg

error message for the validator.

color

a color to initialize the field with, defaults to #000000 (black) if not specified.

Extends: Jx.Widget
